title: Who are the members of the Enhyphen K-pop group? - Quora

response.answer_text: Enhypen:  (Doing this from oldest to youngest members) Oldest: Full name: Lee Hee Seung Stage name: Heeseung Position: Vocalist, rapper, dancer Birthday: October 15th, 2001 Age: 19 ( i think XD not ENTIRELY sure tho:)  Full name: Jay Park Stage name: Jay Position: Dancer, rapper, vocalist Birthday: April 20th, 2002 Age: 18 ( i think… XD)  Full name: Jake Sim Stage name: Jake Position: Dancer, rapper, vocalist Birthday: November 15th, 2002 Age: 18 ( i think XD)  Full name: Park Sung Hoon Stage name: Sunghoon Position: Dancer, vocalist, visual Birthday: December 8th, 2002 Age: 18 ( most likely XD)  Full name: Kim Sun Oo Stage name: Sunoo Position: Vocalist Birthday: June 24th, 2003 Age: 17 (ig haha)  Full name: Yang Jung Won Stage name: Jungwon Position: Vocalist, Dancer Birthday: February 4th, 2004 Age: 16 (my age mwahahaha)  Full name: Nishimura Riki Stage name: Ni-ki Positon: Main dancer, Rapper, Maknae Birthday: December 19th, 2005 Age: 15 ( SO YOUNGGGG OMGGGG)  THATS ALL I HOPE YOU STAN AND LOVE ALLLLLL OF THEM!! WHOS UR BIAS?

Jay - The RAS king Heeseung - The eldest Niki - The youngest , just 14 and dancer too. Sunghwoon - The ice prince Jake - The dancer Jungwon - Heeseung’s child Sunoo - The expression king ENHYPEN - The all visual group Image source : Google
